text:
"Por isso o colar" [redacted_name] diz, sabido. "Você devia levar um presente para ela também, garota."
"Vou ver se acho um par de brincos de ouro" [redacted_name] medita, e eles riem.
"Você acha que ela está bem?"[redacted_name] pergunta, subitamente preocupado com a esposa.
"[redacted_name] sabe se cuidar" a loira responde, mas sente seu coração doer ao lembrar-se de sua mãe.
"Assim como você" [redacted_name] diz, olhando intensamente para a enteada. "Como aprendeu tudo aquilo?"
[redacted_name] dá de ombros. "Meu avô, você, [redacted_name], a mãe, [redacted_name]..."
"Bem que [redacted_name] sempre disse que você seria a melhor guerreira do país" [redacted_name] diz, saudoso. Imediatamente ele observa os músculos da enteada se retesarem com a menção à Arizona, e [redacted_name] fica de pé.
trans:
"That's the reason for the necklace", [redacted_name] says knowingly. "You should take a gift for her too, girl."
"I'll see if I can get a pair of gold earrings too" [redacted_name] muses, and they laugh.
"Do you think she's fine?" [redacted_name] asks, suddenly worried about his wife.
"[redacted_name] can take care of herself", answers the blonde lady, but her heart aches as she gets reminded of her mother.
"Just like you" [redacted_name] says, looking intensely at his stepdaughter. "How did you learn all that?"
[redacted_name] shrugged. "My grandfather, you, [redacted_name], mom, [redacted_name]..."
"As [redacted_name] always said, you'd be the best warrior in the country," says [redacted_name] wistfully. He immediately sees his stepdaughter's muscles tighten at the mention of Arizona, and [redacted_name] stands up.
